activity.oae-label: ACTIVITY TYPE: FILL IN THE BLANKS
activity.title: Dictation
activity.instructions: Listen to the conversation. Type the words you hear to complete the conversation. Then check your answers.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

page.text:
A: <blank word="Can" blanksize="Small"/><blank word="I" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="help" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="you" blanksize="Small"/>, ma’am?
B: I’m <blank word="looking" blanksize="Medium"/> <blank word="for" blanksize="Small"/> a <blank word="small" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="camcorder" blanksize="Medium"/>.
A: Well, <blank word="we" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="have" blanksize="Small"/> several <blank word="brands" blanksize="Small"/>. <blank word="This" blanksize="Small"/> one <blank word="is" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="the" blanksize="Small"/><blank word="smallest" blanksize="Medium"/>.
B: It’s <blank word="nice" blanksize="Small"/>, but it’s <blank word="more" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="than" blanksize="Small"/> I want to <blank word="spend" blanksize="Small"/>.

page.text:
A: Can I help you, sir?
B: Yes. <blank word="How" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="much" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="do" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="you" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="want" blanksize="Small"/>for that necklace?
A: Which <blank word="one" blanksize="Small"/>? <blank word="This" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="one" blanksize="Small"/>?
B: That’s right.
A: Oh, <blank word="that's;that is" blanksize="Medium"/> a nice one. <blank word="Is" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="it" blanksize="Small"/> for your wife?
B: <blank word="Yes" blanksize="Small"/>.

page.text:

B: No, <blank word="that" blanksize="Small"/> one’s <blank word="too" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="big" blanksize="Small"/>.
A: <blank word="How" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="about" blanksize="Small"/> this one?
B: No, <blank word="that" blanksize="Small"/> one’s not <blank word="pretty" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="enough" blanksize="Medium"/>. <blank word="Are" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="these" blanksize="Small"/> the only paintings you have?
A: No. <blank word="We" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="have" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="more" blanksize="Small"/> in the back.
